title: Priority conflict resolution via LLM
description: Resolve conflicting signals without auto-action

title: Audit current Notion Tasks schema vs canonical
description: Inventory live Notion properties/types and compare to spec in plan

comments.author: irako
comments.text:
Audit findings from repo sources (no live Notion access in this environment):

Canonical/spec sources disagree.

CLAUDE.md:
- Task properties: Name(title), Status(status: Tasks/Projects/Ideas/Blocked/Done), Mentioned(number), Blocked(text), Energy(select Red/Yellow/Green), Type(select Identity/Compound), Complete Time(number).
- Later Status table adds Not Now, Won't Do (and omits Waiting On).

API Integration Guide.md:
- Required properties: Name, Type, Status, Estimated minutes, Mentioned, Suggested priority, Suggested reason.

mcp/notion/server.py:
- Reads/writes: Name(title), Status(status), Mentioned(number), Blocked(rich_text), Energy(select), Type(select), Complete Time(number), Priority(number).
- Status mapping includes Waiting On; uses Blocked (not Blocked
